AQSHga borish uchun vizalar 2 xil asosiy: Visas for entry into the United States are divided into 2 main types
Immigrant (muhojir) vizalar. Bu xuddi Ge: Immigrant visas. These are similar to the D category national visas for Germany. That is, if you want to go to the USA for permanent residence, then you need to get visas of this category. The following can be cited as examples of immigrant visas
AQSH fuqarosi bilan oila birlashtirish v: Family reunification visa with a US citizen (for spouses and children under 21)
Ish bilan bog'liq vizalar (yuqori iste'd: Visas related to work (visas for highly skilled workers, professors, managers, religious workers, investors)
Diversity Visa (hammamiz viladigan green: Diversity Visa (green card that everyone dreams of).
Agar siz AQShda viza muddatidan ko’proq: What happens if you stay in the USA longer than your visa allows?
Agar viza muddati tugaganidan keyin 1 ku: If you stay more than 1 day after your visa expires, it will have a big impact on your next visa.
Agar viza muddati tugaganidan keyin 180: If you stay more than 180 days after your visa expires, you may not be allowed to enter the USA for 3 years.
Agar viza muddati tugaganidan keyin 1 yi: If you stay more than 1 year after your visa expires, you may not be allowed to enter the USA for 10 years.
Amerika elchixonasida vizaga murojaat qi: The most frequently asked questions for visa applicants at the US Embassy (90% of questions)
AQShga safaringizning maqsadi nima?: What is the purpose of your trip to the USA?
Nega aynan hozir safar qilmoqchisiz?: Why do you want to travel right now?
AQShning qaysi shahriga bormoqchisiz?: Which city in the USA are you going to?
Qayerda bo‘lasiz? (Mehmonxona, qarindosh: Where will you stay? (Hotel, relative or friend's address)
Yolg‘iz ketyapsizmi yoki kimdir bilanmi?: Are you traveling alone or with someone?
Agar biror kishi bilan bo‘lsa, u kim bo‘: If you are with someone, who is it? (Friend, relative or colleague)
Safaringiz uchun kim xarajat qiladi?: Who will pay for your trip?
Ish joyingiz va lavozimingiz nima?: Where do you work and what is your position?
Oldin boshqa davlatlarga sayohat qilganm: Have you traveled to other countries before?
Oldin AQShga borganmisiz? Agar bo‘lgan b: Have you been to the USA before? If so, when and for how long?
Ish beruvchingizning nomi va manzili?: What is the name and address of your employer?
Qancha vaqtdan beri shu joyda ishlaysiz?: How long have you been working here?
Oylik yoki yillik daromadingiz qancha?: How much is your monthly or annual income?
Ish haqingizdan tashqari boshqa daromad: Do you have any other sources of income besides your job?
AQShdagi qarindoshlar yoki do‘stlar: Relatives or friends in the USA
AQShda qarindoshingiz bormi?: Do you have relatives in the USA?
Agar bo‘lsa, ular kim va qaerda yashaydi: If so, who are they and where do they live?
AQShda sizni kim kutib oladi yoki kim bi: Who will meet you or who will you stay with in the USA?
Kanada davlati butun dunyo bo‘ylab juda: Canada is considered one of the most ideal countries for living and studying for students from all over the world.
Buni chuqur anglagan Kanada davlati huku: The Canadian government, which understands this well, provides many opportunities for studying in Canada for international students.
Albatta, bunday imkoniyatlardan to‘liq: Of course, in order to take full advantage of these opportunities, students must first enter Canada as students.
Bu esa Kanada talabalik vizasini qo‘lga: This is done by obtaining a Canadian student visa.
KANADA turistlik vizasini ishchi vizaga: Can I get a Canadian tourist visa if I have a work visa?
Kanada hukumatining 2020-2024 avgustdagi: According to the decision of the Canadian government from August 2020-2024, tourists in Canada are allowed to work while staying in Canada. The first requirement for this is to receive a job offer from an employer.
Undan tashqari albatta sizga ingliz tili: In addition, you will definitely need English or French. You don't have to know it 100%. You need to have 4 ielts.
Bu qaror kanadaga tashrif buyurgan mehmo: This decision created an opportunity for guests visiting Canada to work in Canada in a legal manner without breaking the law.
Bemalol Kanadaga turist viza bilan borib: Certainly, you can enter Canada with a tourist visa and transfer to a work visa in a legal manner.
EU Shengen hududi o‘zi nima va u nega ke: What is the EU Schengen area and why is it needed?
Shengen hududini tuzish 1985-yil 14-iyun: The establishment of the Schengen area began on June 14, 1985 as an intergovernmental project between five European Union countries - France, Germany, Belgium, the Netherlands and Luxembourg, and gradually expanded to the free travel area of the world. Schengen is a small village on the border of Germany and France in Luxembourg, where the Schengen Agreement and Convention were signed between 1985 and 1990.
Bu viza turi Shengen davlatlariga erkin: This type of visa gives the right to free entry to the Schengen countries, to travel from one country to another without border control.

Yevrokomissiya 2023-yil uchun Shengen vi: The European Commission has calculated the results of issuing Schengen visas for 2023
Shengen viza bo‘yicha murojaatlarning um: The total number of applications for Schengen visas has increased by 37 percent, reaching 10.3 million. The top 5 countries by number of requests
Roʻyxatdan oʻtishdagi qiyinchiliklar, ma: Difficulties in registration, new restrictions by country (full confirmation of departure from Finland, complexity of obtaining German visas) have led to a decrease in the number of applicants by almost 25%.
Shengen vizasi safar maqsadiga ko’ra 2 k: The Schengen visa is issued in 2 categories according to the purpose of the trip - A and C
A kotegoriyasidagi viza Shengen davlati: A visa in category A is intended for international transit through the international transit area of the Schengen state airport and does not give the right to enter the territory of the member states of the Schengen Agreement.
C kotegoriyasidagi viza Shengen kelishuv: A visa in category C is issued for citizens who wish to travel from one country to another through transit or who have expressed a desire to stay in one or more countries that are members of the Schengen Agreement.
Latviyada yarim yil mobaynida 90 kundan: A foreign citizen who needs to stay in Latvia for more than 90 days must formalize a long-term visa (or вид на жительство).
Eng keng tarqalgan sabab. Har bir viza u: The most common reason. The list of documents for each visa is different - if you do not submit all the required documents in full and correctly, you may not be granted a visa.
Ba'zi mamlakatlarda maxsus talablar mavj: Some countries have special requirements - for example, you can take a photo at least 6 months before submitting the documents, and a bank statement can be taken no more than 1 month before.
Bu yerda vaziyat 2 hil. Agar sizda allaq: The situation here is twofold. If you already have many visas, the chance of getting a new one is higher, if not, lower.
Mamlakatda jinoiy ish yuritish, migratsi: Committing criminal offenses, violating migration rules and deporting, unpaid fines abroad can hinder visa issuance. Compliance with migration rules is especially important.
